name: Death Shot
description:
Control your shooting with one finger and fight endless hordes of zombies. Use your trusty handgun or blast the crates and get new weapons - shotguns, rocket launchers and miniguns.

Shooting control is very easy but it's very hard to reach high scores!

* One finger control
* Shoot zombies or get eaten
* Fast paced endless action
* Multiple weapons
* Various types of deadly enemies
* Endless gameplay
